title: The Grapes of wrath
creator_credit: Arthur Barron and C B S
brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “The Great American novel”.
Compares the situation of the farm families of the 1920s as portrayed in Steinbeck’s “Grapes of Wrath” to the situations faced by the Appalachian migrants and negroes of today.
